title: "é" in the code  caused "bpos.to_u32() >= mbc.pos.to_u32() + mbc.bytes as u32"

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: A-parser
labels.description: Area: The parsing of Rust source code to an AST.

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: regression-from-stable-to-stable
labels.description: Performance or correctness regression from one stable version to another.

body:
Was reported here : https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/68730 but still occurring. ### Code ```Rust fn main() { let matches = App::new() .arg( Arg::with_name(OPT_MODE)é ); } ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.50.0-nightly (b32e6e6ac 2020-12-16) binary: rustc commit-hash: b32e6e6ac8921035177256ab6806e6ab0d4b9b94 commit-date: 2020-12-16 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.50.0-nightly ``` ### Error output ``` Compiling bug v0.1.0 (/tmp/bug) Running `rustc --crate-name bug --edition=2018 src/main.rs --error-format=json --json=diagnostic-rendered-ansi --crate-type bin --emit=dep-info,link -C embed-bitcode=no -C debuginfo=2 -C metadata=51917d1ea2d63dad -C extra-filename=-51917d1ea2d63dad --out-dir /tmp/bug/target/debug/deps -C incremental=/tmp/bug/target/debug/incremental -L dependency=/tmp/bug/target/debug/deps` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'assertion failed: bpos.to_u32() >= mbc.pos.to_u32() + mbc.bytes as u32', compiler/rustc_span/src/lib.rs:1489:17 note: run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` environment variable to display a backtrace error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.50.0-nightly (b32e6e6ac 2020-12-16) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu note: compiler flags: -C embed-bitcode=no -C debuginfo=2 -C incremental --crate-type bin note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden query stack during panic: end of query stack error: could not compile `bug` Caused by: process didn't exit successfully: `rustc --crate-name bug --edition=2018 src/main.rs --error-format=json --json=diagnostic-rendered-ansi --crate-type bin --emit=dep-info,link -C embed-bitcode=no -C debuginfo=2 -C metadata=51917d1ea2d63dad -C extra-filename=-51917d1ea2d63dad --out-dir /tmp/bug/target/debug/deps -C incremental=/tmp/bug/target/debug/incremental -L dependency=/tmp/bug/target/debug/deps` (exit code: 101) ```
Backtrace

``` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'assertion failed: bpos.to_u32() >= mbc.pos.to_u32() + mbc.bytes as u32', compiler/rustc_span/src/lib.rs:1489:17 stack backtrace: 0: rust_begin_unwind at /rustc/b32e6e6ac8921035177256ab6806e6ab0d4b9b94/library/std/src/panicking.rs:493:5 1: core::panicking::panic_fmt at /rustc/b32e6e6ac8921035177256ab6806e6ab0d4b9b94/library/core/src/panicking.rs:92:14 2: core::panicking::panic at /rustc/b32e6e6ac8921035177256ab6806e6ab0d4b9b94/library/core/src/panicking.rs:50:5 3: rustc_span::SourceFile::lookup_file_pos 4: rustc_span::SourceFile::lookup_file_pos_with_col_display 5: rustc_span::source_map::SourceMap::is_multiline 6: rustc_parse::parser::Parser::parse_seq_to_before_tokens 7: rustc_parse::parser::Parser::parse_delim_comma_seq 8: rustc_parse::parser::expr::::parse_dot_or_call_expr_with_ 9: rustc_parse::parser::expr::::parse_dot_or_call_expr_with 10: rustc_parse::parser::expr::::parse_prefix_expr::{{closure}} 11: rustc_parse::parser::expr::::parse_prefix_expr 12: rustc_parse::parser::expr::::parse_assoc_expr_with 13: rustc_parse::parser::stmt::::parse_local 14: rustc_parse::parser::stmt::::parse_stmt_without_recovery::{{closure}} 15: rustc_parse::parser::stmt::::parse_stmt_without_recovery 16: rustc_parse::parser::stmt::::parse_full_stmt 17: rustc_parse::parser::stmt::::parse_block_tail 18: rustc_parse::parser::stmt::::parse_block_common 19: rustc_parse::parser::item::::parse_item_kind 20: rustc_parse::parser::item::::parse_item_common_ 21: rustc_parse::parser::item::::parse_item_common 22: rustc_parse::parser::item::::parse_item 23: rustc_parse::parser::item::::parse_mod 24: rustc_parse::parse_crate_from_file 25: rustc_session::utils::::time 26: rustc_interface::passes::parse 27: rustc_interface::queries::Queries::parse 28: rustc_interface::queries::::enter 29: rustc_span::with_source_map 30: rustc_interface::interface::create_compiler_and_run 31: scoped_tls::ScopedKey::set note: Some details are omitted, run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=full` for a verbose backtrace. error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.50.0-nightly (b32e6e6ac 2020-12-16) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu note: compiler flags: -C embed-bitcode=no -C debuginfo=2 -C incremental --crate-type bin note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden ```
